text: Thay sent over cold food that looks like it was eaten out of when I called I was told My next order would be taken care of but calling tonight I find out I received no credit was lied to manager had an attitude and pretty much told me she doesn’t care

text: Rating a 1 because I have to give it a rating. They advertise how long the pizza and delivery are going to take and we always get the food later than what the advertised time is. On two separate occasions they forgot part of my order. They …More

text: It was the worst pizza I have had in a wjilr.  I loved Pizza But until this ezperience.  It tastes like cardboard - tasteless.  So Pizza Hut is now off the list

text: Service was great. Gave me a coupon that saved me a bunch!

text: Great taste, a little over cooked but overall great experience.

name: Shawna W
text: Placed order at 8pm and my food still is not here and its 10:10. Call to see why its taking so long and they said order is on its way but i got the text that my order left the builing at 9:40. I live 3 mins from pizza hut! SMH NEVER AGAIN

name: Heather Kinsey
text: Delicious, accurate and delivered with a smile, this chain still feels hometown with a store full of friendly faces.

name: Andrea Lewis
text: Placed my first order tonight. Took more than an hour to get my pizza and when it came it was cold. Wanted to try Pizza Hut since I always order from Papa Johns. I think I'll go back to Papa Johns for future orders. Reading some of the reviews I'm glad I didn't have to call. I gave three stars because the delivery driver was polite.

name: Michael Mayo
text: I did the pick up and the staff was nice and pizza and wings were great tonight

name: Random Channel
text: Colonial foods really does a crappy job at managing this store. Food cold, late, and undercooked.  What a horrible experience.

name: teresa froemel
text: They have a great group working here. Live the thin n crispy Supreme with extra cheese

name: R D
text: Pizza was not good and not representative of what a Pizza Hut should be.

name: Willie Ralph
text: Friendly staff

name: Eric Schwartz
text:
Great service , nice delivery people food always hot and made perfect how I want it.
The first Pizza Hut store I like .

text: OMG- They suck. Because I live 2.9 miles from them they won’t deliver because everybody has complained about lateness & cold pizza. I like Pizza Hut pizza and now they do this. No wonder why they are struggling, they punish the ones who …More
